name: Montage Screenplay File
summary: Learn about .MONTAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MONTAGE files are used for creating well-formatted movie scripts, as well as for managing the screenplay advertising process.
NOTE: Mariner Software discontinued the development of Montage.

description: Screenplay script created by Montage, a screenwriting application for Mac; contains the movie script as well as information for scenes, characters, and locations; also stores information for the screenplay publishing process, such as research, tasks, contacts, and queries.
